org.epochx.life
Interface RunListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
RunAdapter
public interface RunListener

Provides the interface to be implemented by objects that wish to handle run events. See the RunManager's class documentation for details of when each run event will be fired. To listen for run events during execution of a model, instances of RunListener must be added to the model's LifeCycleManager which is retrievable through a call to the model's getLifeCycleManager() method.

It is typical to listen to events using an anonymous class which often makes the abstract RunAdapter class more convenient to implement.

See Also:
RunAdapter, RunManager

Method Summary
 void onRunEnd()
          Event fired after the run has ended.
 void onRunStart()
          Event fired before the run starts.
 void onSuccess()
          Event fired when a program with a fitness lower than the model's termination fitness is found.
